description: Support to the Start-up of  Women, Peace and Security Institute in Africa based in Ghana in Cooperation with  Kofi Annan   Centre

subproject.description: The Women Peace and Security Institute fully set up and functional providing capacity building to women in the areas of  peace negotiations, peacekeeping activities, gender based violence and policy issues. The skills, knowledge and competencies of Africa Region's women enhanced.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Support to Women,Peace & Secur

subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services

title: Support to Women,Peace & Security in Africa
